frontmatter.title: Algorithms and data structures: Fuel Stations
frontmatter.excerpt: There are N fuel stations along a circular route, where the amount of fuel at station i is A[i] and it cost B[i] in fuel to get to the next station. Where should I start my journey if I want to travel the full circular route?
